I'm so frustrated with... I don't even know. Well, I mean... I do know. I just, there's so much that i'm frustrated with that it's hard to sort it all out in my head. I feel like i'm never good enough. I constantly screw up or annoy people or just am plain out not good enough. I hate this. I fucking hate it. I want things to be how they were. I want time to rewind and go back to a year or two ago. On the other hand I want time to fast forward and just get through this time. I want to get past all the shit that comes along during this time. 
I said to Missy the other day "I wish it was Christmas break." I love that feeling of the last day of school before break. I love the feeling of winter. I'd love for it to be winter break because then I could just go to work, hang out with my friends, not worry about senior or college shit. 
I like to think that i'm an ok person... but i'm not. I'm horrible. I pray every night and it's not for myself. I don't want God to help me. Screw me. I want my friends to be ok. I want my family to be ok. I'd like to think that i'm a good friend but I just don't know. A lot of my friends don't know a lot. I don't know if I can talk to them because I don't think they feel they can talk to me. I want them to talk to me... I want things to be how they were. I have a couple of my friends that I can talk to. I can tell them anything. I don't feel like they'll judge me or think differently of me. Maybe it's because one of them has been my friend for so long, I finally feel like they really care. Like, they've stuck around this long kinda thing. And it sucks because I talk to her all the time but I'll still cry and miss her so much. Everything takes up all my time. That's why I said I wish things could go back to how they were a year ago. I think it's an innocence thing. Not that I was ever innocent but that like last year I didn't have to worry about working, college, scholarships, where i'm going to go.... 
My friends are going through a lot. I'm there for them but I don't know if they want me to be there for them. I try to talk to my friends, like I was telling one of them about all this crap that happened last night but I felt like... they didn't understand. Maybe because they didn't? They don't know a lot. I wish all of my friends knew everything that happens in my life. The thing is though that most of my friends don't really know me at all. I'll talk to them a lot or tell them things but it's bullshit. I love them so much. Maybe that's what scares me. I don't want to love them. I don't want to love them and something happen. Something happen to one of them or one of them leave. But I don't even know when something happens because they don't tell me so that I can try to be there for them. 
I want to change so much. I wish I was... different. I was going to say something about changing physically but Lee would have killed me, lol. That's one of my main problems though. I can't stand it. 
He drives me crazy. Up a fucking wall. Maybe one person knows who I'm talking about. And no, it's not the one that most of my friends would assume i'm talking about. I've had to let go of that. I miss the way things were with him though. Tweet. I just couldn't continue to hold onto the dream of him. Everything about now and later was just so cloudy. I didn't know anything. I miss the love that I felt for him. What I felt was love at the time. When I think about how I felt about him, it makes me happy though. I don't want to look at the bad of the situation. All the pain it caused me. I want to remember all the good stuff and just miss it all. I just hope that he'll have an awesome life and if something is meant to be with him, I'm sure fate can work it out that we'll run into each other later on. 
In the meantime though, the other him.... ::sigh:: Guys are just insane. So am I though, so I guess it works out. I hate that he trys to make me jealous because he khows that I pay attention and that I get jealous. But I can't talk because I've been trying to do the same to him. I love how things were the last time. lol... I know that there's something there and it pisses me off that he won't take charge of it. Take control... courage. I don't know why. 
I need to lose weight or something. Not for him. Because I can't stand it anymore. I'm so bipolar when it comes to this. Somedays I'm perfectly fine, I think I'm perfectly fine. Other days though I feel like i'm utterly disgusting. Aisha was saying how she's been trying to drill into her head "I am pretty, nice smile, smart, funny, etc." I've tried to do that too, to make myself believe that i'm ok. Pleh, I don't think it's worked. It'll work with Aisha because she's finally realizing the truth about herself. Me, it's more like I was trying to convince myself. I told my mom that I think God must like me or something, who knows why. But I was saying he must like me because I have so many great things in my life that I don't think I deserve. I wish I could do so much for my friends. Bring back everything, whatever they want. Help them. I don't think I deserve the friends that I have or to have such a good mom. I mean, we have no money. We weren't going to be able to eat for two weeks but my mom went to the store and wrote a bad check so we could have food. She breaks her back at work, literally. She needs to go to the doctor's again. And then the whole thing with Gavin last night, him telling her that she's a bitch that's going to fucking hell. He's so self-absorbed. My mom has spoiled every single one of us. He doesn't realize everything that she's done for us throughout the years. Gavin almost beat the shit out of me three times last night but I wouldn't put up with it. I've put up with it my entire childhood, whatever childhood I did have. 
There's just so much crap. That's not even the tip of the iceberg. How fucking pathetic is it that I want him to know all this? I want him to know everything. I want him to just hold me, be next to me. I want my friends to know this, but again it'd be just bullshit. Who cares about what I went through? It's nothing compared to everything my friends and everyone else has been through. I don't tell my freinds a lot because I don't want them to view me differently. I don't want them to look at me differently. There's so much that has gone on and is going on and I just go through everyday life like everything's fine. It's amazing how the next day comes no matter what. The sun still rises and sets. 
Anyways, I got my phone back. Well, not my phone but my phone number. My mom found an old phone that she had a couple years ago and we went to Verizon before I went to work today and got her number switched off her slider phone that i've been using and put onto her old phone and got my number put onto her slider phone. So, w00t. I have a phone again. I was so stupid to have misplaced it. Oh well, shit happens. I can't change that I lost it. Unless I had a time machine. That would be awesome. I need to decide if I'm going to school tomorrow or not. I have stuff that I could get done. If I don't go then I can go to work early tomorrow and get some more hours. This is my last week of being able to work because basektball season starts next week. Not that i'm going to make the team, but still.... I really wish that I could do the school musical but it's right during basketball season. If I can't do the musical though, I'm going to try to do the One Acts in the spring. I talked to Mr. Owen and he wants me to do them So, we'll see... Do you know what sucks? I told my mom that if I didn't make the team I didn't think I'd even be a manager. I don't think I could handle another whole year of watching other girls play and dying to be out on the court myself. I love basketball so much, I don't know why. It makes me feel.... ok. Like everything is ok, or just that everything doesn't matter. I feel better when I'm playing... I feel complete almost. It's weird that something can have such an influence on you. If I don't make the school team though, I've already talked to Crystal's Dad (one of last year's varsity players) and I've met with him. He's met with AAU and put together an outside team and I'm going to play with them. 
Mom is made at me. I had to work from 6-9:30 tonight and when I got home I didn't feel like eating dinner. I changed, relaxed for a minute and went running. I had two bowls of cereal before I went to work, my goodness. I'll survive if I don't have an actual "dinner." She just gave me a truffle though, it was really good. I wasn't going to eat it, but I think she would have forced me too. It was a white chocolate truffle and thoroughly enjoyable, lol. I need to finish getting all of my application stuff for college organized. It sucks that I got accepted to a school out of state already and I'm not going. USC in California is still bugging me to apply and UPenn is trying to get me to apply there too. I don't think I'm going to even bother to apply though... I'd just rather stay in Florida and go to UCF or something. 
I should probably get to bed. I don't know if i'm going to school tomorrow. I'm thinking strongly against it at the moment. I was really sick on Wednesday and could use a day to just cool off. How can it be that sometimes i'm so extraordinarily happy and ok with things and then something will happen (or not happen rather) and it's like "damn, this sucks..." ? Most of it has to do with work... ::shrug::
I got to talk to Lee today, which was good... i'd say. I wanted her to get a lot out and she said she felt better. She didn't tell me anything that I hadn't already guessed about though. I just hope that she's ok... with me. I wouldn't want to lose her as a friend. I hope that she's ok. I hope Aisha's ok too. I think Aisha's doing great, she's amazing so she'll be fine no matter what. Missy, I miss you. I wish I didn't work this weekend. I'll have like every friday off starting next week so maybe you can come over and chill? I don't go into until like 3 on saturdays. We'll have to see. Ok, yah... I'm wrapping all this up. That was a long ramble, didn't realize that I had that much to say. I think it also had to do with that I haven't updated in ages and rarely have time to. I shouldn't have spent this long to type all this as it is. All is done. I'll see you all when I see you.
